headline: Jim Cramer Calls Exxon Mobil One of the “Real Leaders in This Market”
summary: Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE:XOM) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his thoughts on. Cramer mentioned the company during the episode and said: “Unfortunately, there’s another wrinkle. Oil looks like it’s headed higher, even if it finished the day in the red, because the president’s $50 barrel plan is suddenly going the wrong way, […]

headline: Trump Wants Venezuela’s Oil. History Says Tread Carefully.
summary: For more than two centuries, U.S. efforts to control the riches in sugar, bananas, rubber, and oil to be found in South and Central America and the Caribbean have met with mixed results.  Now, Trump is vowing to “run” Venezuela to unlock its oil reserves, the world’s largest.
